Package uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.federatedstore.operation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IFederatedOperation Deprecated.
    Concept of a FederatedOperation class will not exist from 2.4.0, all federation specifics are handled via operation options.
    IFederationOperation Deprecated.
    Concept of a FederatedOperation class will not exist from 2.4.0, all federation specifics are handled via operation options.

    FederatedOperationChainValidator
    Validation class for validating OperationChains against ViewValidators using the Federated Store schemas.
